mapper.insert: insert into Fcube (Cubeuuid, Uid, longitude, latitude, CubeName, CubeType, MakeTime, Influence) values (#{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cubename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cubetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{influence,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update Fcube set Uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CubeName = #{cubename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CubeType = #{cubetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MakeTime = #{maketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Influence = #{influence,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where Cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
